modName: Chao's Lore Friendly Elisif Replacer - Super Light Edition
summary: Elisif the Fair's face Change LIttle.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=4][i]This Mod is Standalone.
[/i][/size][/size]
[size=3]Installation
Please remove MOD which is modifying [/size][size=3]Elisif 's face records. Otherwise [/size][size=3][size=3]Elisif[/size] 's face will be ugly.


■Required Mods
None

■Recommended Mods[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url][/size]
or
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/]PureSkinTexture[/url]



I use[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56812/]ankoENB BETA3[/url].
author: chao
